titles.title: THERE IS A RIVER WHOSE STREAMS

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a river whose streams, make glad the city of our God (2x)
I will rejoice, I will rejoice and be glad

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is a fountain full of grace
And it flows from Emmanuel's veins
It came and it healed me, came and it filled me
Came and it washed my sins away
I will rejoice, I will rejoice and be glad.
